plot: Who removes graffiti? Meet a man who does it for a living, as he talks candidly about his job, how he feels about it, and why graffiti culture needs him as much as any artist.
title: The Buffer
plot_es: Who removes graffiti? Meet a man who does it for a living, as he talks candidly about his job, how he feels about it, and why graffiti culture needs him as much as any artist.
plot_en: Who removes graffiti? Meet a man who does it for a living, as he talks candidly about his job, how he feels about it, and why graffiti culture needs him as much as any artist.
